Title: Wizkid’s Morayo becomes Nigeria’s most-streamed album of 2025
Summary: Apple Music and Spotify have dropped their year-end charts . Despite being released in November 2024, Morayo by Wizkid becomes Nigeria’s most-streamed album of 2025 .

Title: 16 Rivers Assembly members, speaker dump PDP for APC
Summary: Sixteen members of the Rivers State House of Assembly have defected from the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) to the All Progressives Congress (APC) Speaker Martin Amaewhule announced this during a plenary session on Friday .

Title: FG sets February 2026 for take-off of UNESCO media literacy centre
Summary: FG has fixed February 2026 for the commencement of operations at the world’s first UNESCO Category 2 Media and Information Literacy Centre .

Title: Nigerian Army rescues 10 abducted women in Kaduna
Summary: Nigerian Army says troops of Operation Peace Shield rescued 10 kidnapped women during a special operation . The operation took place in Sanga Local Government Area of Kaduna State . A credible source at Army Headquarters revealed this to The Guardian .

Title: Stakeholders intensify efforts against local human trafficking in Nigeria
Summary: Stakeholders are urging against local human trafficking in Nigeria . They say it is a frequent occurrence within families and communities . The trafficking is often occurring in families and within communities .

Title: Putin offers India ‘uninterrupted’ oil
Summary: Putin, on his first visit to close partner India since the Ukraine war, was given a red-carpet welcome with an honour guard and 21-gun salute .

Title: Netflix to buy Warner Bros
Summary: Netflix has emerged top bidder to buy TV and film group Warner Bros Discovery, parent company of HBO, CNN and Warner Bros film . Streaming giant Netflix is the top bidder for the deal .

Title: 6 Ways Nigerian Families Share Care (Without Even Realizing It)
Summary: Care isn’t always a grand gesture, it’s in the smallest, most everyday moments like who washes the dishes after Sunday rice . Here are 6 ways Nigerian families already share care at home (and how Morning Fresh makes it easier)

Title: Army rescues 10 abducted women in Kaduna
Summary: Soldiers engaged the criminals with superior firepower, forcing them to abandon the captives and flee . According to the soldiers, the soldiers engaged them with . superior firepower . The soldiers said the criminals abandoned their captives and fled .

Title: Gen Musa assumes duty as new Defence Minister
Summary: Gen. Musa was appointed on Tuesday by President Bola Tinubu following the resignation of former minister Muhammed Badaru . He was confirmed by the Senate on Thursday . Gen Musa assumes duty as new Defence Minister .

Title: Ogun health college graduates 422, urges empathy, integrity
Summary: The Provost of De Potter College of Health Technology, Oru-Ijebu in Ogun State, has urged the institution’s graduating students to prioritise integrity, empathy and professionalism . He made the call on Friday during the combined graduation ceremony of 422 students for the 2023/2024 and 2024/2025

Title: EPL: Saliba, Trossard, Mosquera doubtful for Arsenal’s trip to Villa, says Arteta
Summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta confirmed on Friday that several first-team players remain doubtful for Saturday’s Matchday 15 trip to Aston Villa . Title: Kwara refutes awarding $800m contract to gov's brother, PDP demands probe
Summary: Kwara State Government and the Peoples Democratic Party are locked in a war of words over an allegation that Governor AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq secretly awarded an $800 million contract to his elder brother . Title: Turkey orders arrest of 29 footballers in betting scandal
Summary: Istanbul public prosecutor’s office said Friday it had ordered the arrest of 46 people, among them 29 football players, as part of a sprawling investigation into illegal betting on Turkish matches . Among the arrested players, 27 of them are suspected of having bet on matches involving their own teams, in which they themselves were playing, the prosecutor�

Title: Military, NYSC strengthen partnership in Borno for corps members' safety
Summary: The Theatre Commander, Joint Task Force (North East), Operation Hadin Kai, Major General Abdulsalam Abubakar, reiterated commitment to strengthening partnership with the National Youth Service Corps in Borno State . He made the pledge when the NYSC Coordinator, Mallam Nasir Bello, led his management team on a courtesy visit
